title: Development of a Problem-Based Collaborative Learning Model for Information Systems Analysis and Design

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Course for professionals in medical/legal/technical fields to strengthen information system analysis and design competencies. Establishes collaborative learning environments using digital devices.

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners can analyze real business scenarios to produce system requirement specifications.
Teams achieve 90% accuracy in UML diagrams and data modeling through project-based collaboration.
Higher-order thinking (analysis, evaluation, creation) assessment scores improve by 30% during collaborative problem-solving using digital tools.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
